charges.charge_description: Defts knowingly, unlawfully and intentionally combine, conspire, confederate and agree to possess with intent to distribute a controlled substance. This violation involved 50 grams or more of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of cocaine base, a Schedule II Controlled Substance; In violation of 21 841(a)(1) &; 846;
